text: Bogdan Pikuta (born 12 August 1972) is a retired Polish football striker.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Górnik Zabrze players Category:GKS Katowice players Category:Stal Stalowa Wola players Category:Widzew Łódź players Category:Raków Częstochowa players Category:KSZO Ostrowiec Świętokrzyski players Category:Zagłębie Sosnowiec players Category:Victoria Jaworzno players Category:Association football forwards
title: Bogdan Pikuta
